commit.message:
re PR lto/65380 ([ICF] LTO: ICE in add_symbol_to_partition_1, at lto/lto-partition.c:158)

Fix PR ipa/65380.

	PR ipa/65380
	* ipa-icf.c (sem_function::merge): Do not merge DECL_EXTERNAL symbols.
	(sem_variable::merge): Likewise.

From-SVN: r221519

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@

+
+	PR ipa/65380
+	* ipa-icf.c (sem_function::merge): Do not merge DECL_EXTERNAL symbols.
+	(sem_variable::merge): Likewise.
+
